bibl.title: The Significance of the Papyri for Determining the Nature of the New Testament Text in the Second Century: A Dynamic View of Textual Transmission.
Eldon Jay EPP and Gordon D. FEE, Studies in the Theory and Method of New Testament Textual Criticism
bibl.author: EPP, Eldon Jay

bibl.note: Reproduit de: William L. PETERSEN (Ed.), Gospel Traditions in the Second Century: Origins, Recensions, Text, and Transmission = Christianity and Judaism in Antiquity. 3 (Notre-Dame, Indiana, 1989) pp. 1-32, 1 carte.
